https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/z1poRHLxrBlXXXJjtEOYbMF6udw.jpg A young maestro and community leader dies suddenly. Family and friends gather at Mangueira Samba School rehearsal building to pay last respects. But amazing things will happen in this unique funeral ceremony. A Funeral at the Samba School
